example.content.operation
Class RenameContentOperation

java.lang.Object
  com.polopoly.orchid.widget.OWidgetBase
      example.content.operation.RenameContentOperation
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.polopoly.cm.app.orchid.widget.OBatchOperation.ContentOperation, com.polopoly.orchid.widget.OWidget, java.io.Serializable
public class RenameContentOperation
extends com.polopoly.orchid.widget.OWidgetBase
implements com.polopoly.cm.app.orchid.widget.OBatchOperation.ContentOperation

This operation class is an example of how to write a pluggable operation for the OBatchOperation widget. This particular operation renames all selected content, which may not be the most useful operation of all. Operations must implement OBatchOperation.ContentOperation inteface. Since this class also implements the OWidget interface, it will be initialized and rendered by the OBatchOperation widget. To create an input template with this batch operation, import the following XML: 

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<template-definition version="1.0" xmlns="http://www.polopoly.com/polopoly/cm/app/xml">
  <input-template name="example.content.operation.RenameContentOperation">
    <viewer>com.polopoly.cm.app.widget.OTopPolicyWidget</viewer>
    <editor>com.polopoly.cm.app.widget.OTopPolicyWidget</editor>
    <field name="batchoperation" input-template="p.BatchOperation">
      <param name="operationClassName">example.content.operation.RenameContentOperation</param>
    </field>
  </input-template>
</template-definition>
To create a content using this template, import the following XML: 
<?xml version="1.0" ?>
<batch xmlns="http://www.polopoly.com/polopoly/cm/xmlio">
  <content>
    <metadata>
      <contentid>
        <major>Article</major>
        <externalid>RenameContentOperation</externalid>
      </contentid>
      <input-template>
        <externalid>example.content.operation.RenameContentOperation</externalid>
      </input-template>
      <security-parent>
        <externalid>GreenfieldTimes.d</externalid>
      </security-parent>
    </metadata>
    <component group="polopoly.Content" name="name">Rename Content</component>
    <contentref name="insertParentId" group="polopoly.Parent">
      <contentid>
        <externalid>GreenfieldTimes.d</externalid>
      </contentid>
    </contentref>
  </content>
</batch>
